Translations.Text: The (mandatory) charities are only for the poor and the needy and the processors of it and those whose hearts are interested (in submission) and (for freeing) the slaves and those in debt and in God's way and the traveler (in need), a mandate from God. God is knowledgeable and wise

And some of them are those who harass the prophet and they say: he is all ears. Say: it is better for you that he is all ears, as he believes in God and believes in the believers and he is a mercy for those of you who believed. And those who harass the messenger of God have a painful punishment
They swear by God for you to please you, while God and His messenger are more deserving to be pleased, if they were believers
Did they not know that whoever opposes God and His messenger then indeed fire of hell is for him, remaining in there forever? That is the great humiliation
The hypocrites are afraid that a chapter is sent down about them informing them of what is in their hearts. Say: make fun, indeed God brings out what you are wary of
And if you ask them, they shall say: we were only kidding and playing. Say: were you making fun of God and His signs and His messenger
Do not apologize, indeed you disbelieved after your belief. If We excuse a group of you, We will punish a group, because they were guilty
